segments.text: This place is so quiet and peaceful . It ’ s really different from my pad at city .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , do you think you could live out here ? You know , back to nature at all ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t know . I don ’ t mind coming out here for a while , but that will get old pretty soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s what I was thinking . I mean can you imagine Friday night instead of going out with your friends you ’ d have to stay in your tree house and talk to birds and squirrels .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I ’ d go lonely if I do like that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And where would you get a cup of cappuccino ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now that would be hard to live without . We city folks are pretty spoiled .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe . But I ‘ d rather be spoiled than turn into a crazy guy with a long period to talk to the birds .
segments.speaker: S2
